item.author: ssphugo@srkn.anonaddy.com (Srikanth Perinkulam)
item.description: @ndanes@smallcamp.art I’ve had absolutely zero issues using [nextcloudpi](https://ownyourbits.com/nextcloudpi/#supported_systems). Silently been chugging along for a few years now with auto-updates and close to zero manual intervention. For the maps alternative, I’ve had my eyes on [Magic earth](https://www.magicearth.com/)
